name: MDVC Creative
description:
MDVC Creative, Inc., was founded over 25 years ago by sales guru and artist, Molly DeVoss. She set a non-traditional tone for the agency/studio by structuring it to bridge the gap between marketing and business development efforts. Today, MDVC is known for its ability to see solutions that grow businesses. Their experience in marketing is vast, encompassing both a B2B and a consumer focus.
The future of MDVC includes dedication to remaining on the forefront of cutting-edge ways to increase your business sales, and satisfaction, through unwavering customer service. Our long list of awards is a result of operating under the philosophy that the underlying foundation of any design is a coherent, truly focused message.
